pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Lightweight Interface Between 'ggplot2' and 'igraph' Objects // Interface to integrate 'igraph' and 'ggplot2' graphics within spatial maps. 'RGraphSpace' implements new geometric objects using 'ggplot2' prototypes, customized for representing large 'igraph' objects in a normalized coordinate system. By scaling shapes and graph elements, 'RGraphSpace' can provide a framework for layered visualizations.
